name: Carpathian Skies
storyline:
What does it mean to be a person when every single part of you used to be someone else? What do you do when other people are tasked with deciding whether you should exist?

In Carpathian Skies you are a chimera - a mockery of science and possibly seen as an abomination. Every single facet of you was once someone else - not many of them went willingly into your creation. You're taken in by the crew of a sky ship known as The Carpathia, who have been hired to retrieve the eyes of a beloved member of the country's ruling council after their vicious murder and mutilation. . . Eyes that now belong to you.
